rekit.core

Class GameGrid

  • java.lang.Object
    • rekit.core.GameGrid

  • public abstract class GameGrid
extends Object
    This class defines all necessary methods for drawing GameElements etc. on a game grid
    Author:
    Dominik Fuchss, Angelo Aracri

      • drawRectangle

        public final void drawRectangle(Vec pos,
                                Vec size,
                                RGBColor color,
                                boolean inGame)
        Draw a rectangle.
        Parameters:
        pos - the position
        size - the size
        color - the color
        inGame - this indicates whether the drawing belongs to a GameElement (ingame -> CameraDependend) or a GuiElement (not ingame -> FrameDepenedend)
